name: Oscillating Magic
description:
A small adventure game where you go around collecting pages to create your own Magic . Made within 72 hours for LÖVE Jam 2020

Build with LÖVE 11.3. Code and most to all art was made during the jam. Music wasn't made during the jam, it was taken from a collection of assets I've paid for previously.

Due to time constraints, the magic system wasn't fully implemented and so, you can create magic but you cannot use it. You can explore the world, and interact with NPCs with cutscenes!

If you're lost, talk to God as he will hint to what you can do next! God is a little confused in his wise old age so he has gotten West and East mixed up!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys for movement
  • Tab or E or I to open your journal to make magic
  • Space to interact with what's in-front of you

Features

  • Cutscenes
  • Interactive world and NPCs
  • Create your own magic by using pages you discover in the world!
  • Save games
